title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
This RFC proposes to clearly define the scope and requirements for the blockchain-based product tracking and verification system. The technical requirements will address stakeholder needs, system constraints, expected functionality, data models, security considerations (including potential attack vectors and mitigation strategies), scalability requirements, performance expectations, integration points with existing systems, and user experience design considerations. The functional and non-functional requirements will be clearly defined, along with an outline for the system architecture. A plan for testing and validation processes will be provided, including a timeline for milestones and key deliverables. Edge cases, error handling mechanisms, potential future expansions or upgrades of the system, and industry best practices, regulations, and standards will also be considered in the design and implementation. 

Please note that this RFC is currently in the 'READY_FOR_APPROVAL' state and assigned to the project manager. Upon approval, the next step would be task decomposition by the code architect or relevant team members.

**Proposed Changes:** Add more specific details on the expected functionality of the system, such as real-time tracking capabilities, data encryption methods, user roles and permissions, and integration with popular logistics software.

**Recommendation:** Upon approval, this RFC should be assigned to the code architect for task decomposition.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the blockchain network, data models, and integration with existing systems.

title: Develop Blockchain Network
description: Implement the blockchain network, including node setup, consensus mechanism, and smart contract deployment.

title: Build Product Tracking and Verification System
description: Develop the system for tracking and verifying product origin and transactions, including user interfaces and integration with the blockchain network.

title: Implement Data Integration
description: Integrate the system with existing data sources and systems to ensure seamless data flow and synchronization.

title: Develop Security and Access Controls
description: Implement security measures and access controls to ensure data integrity, privacy, and system security.

title: Test and Quality Assurance
description: Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure system quality and reliability.
dependencies: Build Product Tracking and Verification System

title: Deploy and Maintain System
description: Deploy the system to production environments, set up monitoring and logging, and establish maintenance procedures.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides to support system adoption and usage.
dependencies: Build Product Tracking and Verification System
